Serialized Form

  • Package cell

    • Class cell.Cell

      class Cell extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • state
          CellState state
          The current state held in a cell
        • x
          int x
          Col axis value
        • y
          int y
          Row axis value

  • Package othello

    • Class othello.Game

      class Game extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blackDepth
          int blackDepth
          Black player depth (only used if black player is an AI)
        • blackPlayer
          PlayerType blackPlayer
          The type of the black player (AI or Human).
        • emoji
          boolean emoji
          Parameter that dictates if the game will display emojis or letters false = letters; true = emojis
        • grid
          Grid grid
          The game board.
        • input
          boolean input
          Parameter that dictates if the game will ask player's moves with coordinates or keyboard (z; q; s; d; e) false = keyboard; true = coordinates
        • state
          GameState state
          Current state of the game.
        • whiteDepth
          int whiteDepth
          White player depth (only used if white player is an AI)
        • whitePlayer
          PlayerType whitePlayer
          The type of the white player (AI or Human).

    • Class othello.Grid

      class Grid extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blackDepth
          int blackDepth
          Black player depth (only used if black player is an AI)
        • board
          ArrayList<ArrayList<Cell>> board
          2D array containing the cells that make up the board
        • currentPlayer
          PlayerType currentPlayer
          Current player type (indicates how the move is selected)
        • cursor
          Cell cursor
          Indicates the cell where the cursor is currently placed
        • emoji
          boolean emoji
          Parameter that dictates if the game will display emojis or letters false = letters; true = emojis
        • input
          boolean input
          Parameter that dictates if the game will ask player's moves with coordinates or keyboard (z; q; s; d; e) false = keyboard; true = coordinates
        • numBlack
          int numBlack
          Total number of black cells on the board
        • numWhite
          int numWhite
          Total number of white cells on the board
        • turn
          GameState turn
          Current state of the game (indicates which player needs to play)
        • validMoves
          ArrayList<Cell> validMoves
          List containing all of current player's valid moves
        • validMovesOpp
          ArrayList<Cell> validMovesOpp
          List containing all of opponent player's valid moves
        • whiteDepth
          int whiteDepth
          White player depth (only used if white player is an AI)
